title: Any place at PES that is relatively free of obnoxious couples?
content:
I'm no BD activist, and romance is cool and all, but my eyes are constantly bombarded by in-your-face PDA. Sitting together and all is fine, but just now there were people dancing under tables, pulling hair, tickling, and giggling. The problem could be me and I should just learn to live with it, but is there some spot that's *not* a frolicking spot?  


  


~~This post was a joke and I just typed this cause I've been bored of serious stuff and expect some funny answers.~~

comments.body:
You can go the Golden Jubilee block which is getting constructed lol. Oh wait, I've heard people do stuff over there as wellðŸ˜”

So basically no spot lol
COE Office, Inside backgate sutta shop, mechanical classrooms.
at this point im more worried about 5 ISAs than seeing PDAs man
Oh lollll, that was a great idea actually, it's quite deserted xD
If you see a face in the newspaper tomorrow, guess you'll know who. I am. ;)
Yeah, now I guess it will just be Poor Displays of Academics. :, (
Mechanical classrooms?! Please explain this brilliance lol.
